description:
The stage is set for the Fortune Cup, as eight elite duelists vie for the chance to take on the reigning champion Jack Atlas.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Duel of Fortune Cup Kaimaku: Dai Kuushuu! Giant Bomber Air Raid
